column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////There are some minor struggles
column2: because it seems that everyone else in Houston is a fan
column3: so the line often goes out the door in the morning
column4: and a lot of the best goods are sold out by the afternoon. But the staff is certainly attentive and efficient
column5: so the experience is still pleasant overall! And they have their own parking lot. Thank goodness.
